items.title: Forrester on cybersecurity budgeting: 2025 will be the year of CISO fiscal accountability
items.description: With 90% of cybersecurity and risk leaders predicting they'll see budget increases in 2025, many are facing a new era of accountability.

items.title: Why 2025 will be the year of AI orchestration
items.description: For many, 2025 will be the year of AI agents, when pilot programs, experiments and use cases converge into something resembling ROI.

items.title: Nvidia to open-source Run:ai, the software it acquired for $700M to help companies manage GPUs for AI
items.description: Nvidia has completed its acquisition of Run:ai, a software company that makes it easier for customers to orchestrate GPU clouds for AI.

items.title: Despite intense AI arms race, we’re in for a multi-model future
items.description: There will be no single model that will rule the universe, neither next year nor next decade. Instead, the future of AI will be multi-model.

items.title: Five breakthroughs that make OpenAI’s o3 a turning point for AI — and one big challenge
items.description: OpenAI’s o3 tackles specific hurdles in reasoning and adaptability that have long stymied large language models. At the same time, it exposes challeng...
